name: Introduction to Installation Art
description: This course will introduce students to the concept and practice of installation art, featuring lecture, discussion, and hands-on practice.

name: Creating Installation Art
description: This course will focus on the practical creation of installation art. Students will work in groups to create installations in the classroom and learn how to document their work.

name: Installation Art Theory and Criticism
description: This course will focus on the theoretical and critical aspects of installation art. Students will learn to interpret and critique the works of installation artists.

name: Advanced Installation Art
description: This course will focus on more advanced techniques and concepts in installation art. Students will analyze and create their own works of installation art.
